title: Zomato shuts intercity food delivery service Legends due to lack of product-market fit
description: In its second version, the company tweaked the model to deliver pre-stocked items from other cities with a shorter delivery timeline. A senior company executive had earlier told ET that next-day deliveries did not solve customers’ hunger pangs.
content: Food delivery platform Zomato has shut down its intercity food delivery service, Zomato Legend, its chief executive, Deepinder Goyal, said in a post on X.“Update on Zomato Legends--after two years of trying, not finding product market fit, we have decided to shut down the service with immediate effect,” Goyal said on Thursday.
